scripts.bp:_clean: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules .gen .logs .nyc_output .logs .output.txt .coverage .angular dist app www && npm i
scripts.bp:bump: OLD_VERSION="v$(node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)")" && VERSION="$(npm version patch --no-git-tag-version)" && npm i && echo "export const bpInfo = {version:'$VERSION'}" > ./src/bpInfo.ts && git tag $OLD_VERSION && git checkout -b $VERSION
scripts.bp:branch:push: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && git add . && (git diff-index --quiet HEAD && echo 'No changes to commit' || git commit -m "$BRANCH pushed") && git push
scripts.bp:branch:last-push:main: npm run bp:branch:push && npm run bp:branch:squash && BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && git checkout main && git merge $BRANCH && git push
scripts.bp:main:package: git checkout package && git merge main && git push && git checkout main
scripts.bp:main:sandbox: git checkout sandbox && git merge main && git push && git checkout main
scripts.DO-All: node ./scripts/find-projects.js && node ./scripts/check-project-type.js && node ./scripts/check-gitignore.js && node ./scripts/check-memory-bank.js && node ./scripts/check-scripts.js && node ./scripts/check-all.js
